title: Adolescents with hemophilic knee arthropathy can improve their gait characteristics, functional ability, and physical activity level through kinect-based virtual reality: A randomized clinical trial
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Alshimaa R. Azab, Ragab K. Elnaggar, Ghfren S. Aloraini, Osama R. Aldhafian, Naif N. Alshahrani, FatmaAlzahraa H. Kamel, Maged A. Basha, Walaa E. Morsy
